lead_paragraph: Brazilian riot police used tear gas and stun grenades to disperse a small protest near the Maracana stadium that will host Friday's opening ceremony for the Olympic Games, Reuters television images showed.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Police Use Tear Gas, Stun Grenades at Rio Protest
headline.main: Brazil Police Use Tear Gas, Stun Grenades at Rio Protest
